name: grid_overlay_snapshot
title: Grid overlay screenshot for coordinates
description: Capture a grid-annotated screenshot to make click coordinates explicit.

arguments.name: goal
arguments.description: What you plan to click or inspect

arguments.name: output_path
arguments.description: Optional custom path for the grid screenshot

content.text: Goal: {{goal}}. Call `screenshot_with_grid` using grid_size={{grid_size}} when provided and output_path={{output_path}} when provided. Return file_path, scaling_factor/warnings, and remind that grid labels are logical coordinates for `click_screen`. If the target is visible, list 1-3 candidate logical coordinates to click.
